title: Without Anxiety About Imperfection - featuring special guest, Haemin Sunim, with Tara Brach
itunes:title: Without Anxiety About Imperfection - featuring special guest, Haemin Sunim, with Tara Brach
description:
Without Anxiety About Imperfection - featuring special guest, Haemin Sunim, with Tara Brach (2019-01-23) - Internationally known Buddhist teacher and writer, Haemin Sunim, talks about his new book - Love for Imperfect Things. Then, he and Tara talk together and respond to questions.

Your support enables us to continue to offer these talks and meditations freely. If you value them, I hope you will consider offering a donation at this time at www.tarabrach.com/donation/.

With gratitude and love, Tara
